messages.message: Hi friends, just to be mindful: phishing is still a high threat. In particular targeted to the forensic team involved. Stay alert! Thanks.
Team, come back to me when you've found out which organization has hacked us.

Hi team, while working through DarkWeb traces we found this cyber investigator who found and anonymously published the source code [TWITTER] of the ransomware being used in our organization. That must be a major blow for Sur5, but possibly great news for us. Perhaps by reviewing that code, you can find traces to where they have transferred our data.
